meanings.definition: A person or thing that reshapes something.
meanings.sent1: The talented reshapers in the workshop crafted beautiful pottery.
meanings.sent2: The reshapers carefully molded the clay into intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The reshapers at the art fair turned old glass bottles into stunning vases.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like reshapers, transforming his perspective on life.
meanings.sent5: The reshapers' hands worked magic on the raw material, creating art.

meanings.definition: A group of people who reshape something.
meanings.sent1: The dedicated reshapers worked together to renovate the community park.
meanings.sent2: The reshapers collaborated to redesign the layout of the office.
meanings.sent3: The reshapers at the event transformed the space into a colorful wonderland.
meanings.sent4: The reshapers were like a team of architects, rebuilding the structure from scratch.
meanings.sent5: The group of reshapers brought new life to the old building with their innovative ideas.

meanings.sent1: The reshapers of the metal used precise tools to bend it into shape.
meanings.sent2: The reshapers of the landscape sculpted the hills to create a picturesque view.
meanings.sent3: The reshapers of the dough twisted it into various shapes for the bakery.
meanings.sent4: Time acted as the reshapers of history, altering the course of events.
meanings.sent5: The reshapers of the policy revised it to better suit the needs of the community.
